tasks.task_description: Check package.json for dependencies and scripts
Look for any error logs or build issues
Check main application files for syntax/runtime errors
Identify and fix any configuration issues

description: Check Next.js project structure and resolve any issues found
context: Examined project structure - Next.js 16.0.10 with React 19.2.1, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, Three.js, and React Three Fiber. Found firebase-debug.log indicating Firebase CLI activity but no errors.

Found ESLint issues: 6 errors and 9 warnings. Main issues are: 1) TypeScript any type usage, 2) React purity violations with Math.random() calls, 3) Unused imports/variables, 4) Type assertion preferences.

Fixed all ESLint issues and build problems. Issues resolved: 1) Removed unused imports (Code2, Button, Target, cn, useState, teamFilters), 2) Fixed TypeScript any type usage, 3) Fixed React purity violations by replacing Math.random with deterministic positioning, 4) Used const assertions instead of literal type assertions, 5) Added dynamic imports for 3D components to prevent SSR issues. Project now builds successfully and development server starts without errors.
